name: subtitle-cli
description: Subtitle CLI with OpenClaw-friendly JSON contract

scripts.build: tsdown src/index.ts src/cli.ts src/domain/types.ts src/domain/providers.ts src/domain/request-normalization.ts src/domain/ranking.ts src/commands/search.ts src/commands/download.ts src/commands/fetch.ts src/commands/doctor.ts src/commands/providers.ts --format esm --dts
